name: Forescape
description:
Created in under 1 week for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3

Jump and dodge obstacles in a mysterious forest where the less light there is, the more things become visible.

The current record for speedrunning this game is 05:09.740 by Nature Studioz.
If you beat this record, message me or comment a screenshot of your time, and I'll update this.

Controls:
Movement: A D, arrow keys
Jump: Space, W, up arrow key

Credits:
Programming: Kyota Poeti
Design: Kyota Poeti, Noah Reinhart, Daniel Machado, Nico Warkus
Art / Animation: Nico Warkus
Music / SFX: Daniel Machado
